remarks: Inference removing two restricted quantifiers.  Same as ~ rexlimdvv , but with bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable restrictions.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
rexlim2d.x $e |- F/ x ph $.
rexlim2d.y $e |- F/ y ph $.
rexlim2d.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) -> ( ps -> ch ) ) ) $.
rexlim2d $p |- ( ph -> ( E. x e. A E. y e. B ps -> ch ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d ch x y $.
